name: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky
description: Known as 'The Great One', Wayne Gretzky knew a thing or two about winning.
He holds the NHL records for points and assists, and led also in goals until Alexander Ovechkin recently passed him
He still has more assists than any other player has points. Unbelievable
He was pretty much the Michael Jordan of hockey, although if Jordan had played hockey he probably would have been better

name: Life is 10% of what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it
author: Charles Swindoll
description: We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations
Each day of our lives we make deposits in the memory banks of our children
The remarkable thing is, we have a choice everyday regarding the attitude we will embrace for that day
When you have a vision it affects your attitude. Your attitude is optimistic rather than pessimistic
When I think of vision, I have in mind the ability to see above and beyond the majority

name: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
author: Henry David Thoreau
description: When we are focused on our dreams, we are much more likely to accomplish that dream. If you can dream it you can do it
It is too easy sometimes to settle for 'good enough', when we really should be asking ourselves, 'how is this helping me accomplish my dreams?'
Henry David Thoreau was an amazing writer, right up there with Edgar Allen Poe and Nathaniel Hawthorne
He attended Princeton in the 15th Century and shared a class with the great Nick Saban. That class was called Pottery 101.
His favorite book was Harry Potter, and he became good friends with J.K. Rowling and often wrote poems with her. Good times.

name: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Adair
description: What an amazing quote this is. It is tough to face our fears, but when we do, we are better for it.
Fear is an illusion. Once you expose it as such, it will no longer hinder you.
God tells us not to fear, but instead put our trust in him. The outcome is already determined. He has a plan for everything and that is great.
What a wonderful thought that we do not have to fear. Breaking through our fears makes us confident to do just about anything we want to do
